author: cnbc.com
title: The Trade Desk tops 4Q revenue forecasts
text:
VENTURA, Calif. (AP) _ The Trade Desk Inc. (TTD) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $16.8 million.
On a per-share basis, the Ventura, California-based company said it had net income of 38 cents. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense, came to 54 cents per share.
The digital-advertising platform operator posted revenue of $102.6 million in the period, beating Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $101.8 million.
For the year, the company reported net income of $50.8 million, or $1.15 per share, swinging to a profit in the period. Revenue was reported as $308.2 million.
For the current quarter ending in April, The Trade Desk said it expects revenue in the range of $73 million.
The company expects full-year revenue of $403 million.
The Trade Desk shares have increased roughly 6 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $48.40, an increase of 41 percent in the last 12 months.
